crews.title: Crews
crews.name: Name
crews.name_help: Name (just id, it doesn't affect anything)
crews.warning_no_manager: Crew {name} has no manager agent or manager llm set for hierarchical process
crews.warning_no_planning_llm: Crew {name} has planning enabled but no planning LLM selected
crews.delete_description: This action will delete the selected crew. You can optionally delete its agents and tasks.
crews.delete_conflict_notice: If an item is used elsewhere it's marked as a conflict and unchecked by default.
crews.conflict_used_in_external_tasks: Used in tasks outside this crew: {tasks}
crews.conflict_referenced_context: Referenced as context in other tasks: {tasks}
crews.error_streamlit_version: This Streamlit version does not support st.dialog â€“ please upgrade Streamlit.

tools.title: Tools
tools.name: Name
tools.desc_scrape_website: A tool that can be used to read website content.
tools.desc_file_read: A tool that can be used to read a file's content.
tools.desc_directory_search: A tool that can be used to semantic search a query from a directory's content.
tools.desc_directory_read: Use the tool to list the contents of the specified directory
tools.desc_code_docs_search: A tool that can be used to search through code documentation.
tools.desc_youtube_video_search: A tool that can be used to semantic search a query from a Youtube Video content.
tools.desc_serper_dev: A tool that can be used to search the internet with a search_query
tools.desc_youtube_channel_search: A tool that can be used to semantic search a query from a Youtube Channels content. Channel can be added as @channel
tools.desc_website_search: A tool that can be used to semantic search a query from a specific URL content.
tools.desc_csv_search: A tool that can be used to semantic search a query from a CSV's content.
tools.desc_docx_search: A tool that can be used to semantic search a query from a DOCX's content.
tools.desc_exa_search: A tool that can be used to search the internet from a search_query
tools.desc_github_search: A tool that can be used to semantic search a query from a Github repository's content. Valid content_types: code,repo,pr,issue (comma sepparated)
tools.desc_json_search: A tool that can be used to semantic search a query from a JSON's content.
tools.desc_mdx_search: A tool that can be used to semantic search a query from a MDX's content.
tools.desc_pdf_search: A tool that can be used to semantic search a query from a PDF's content.
tools.desc_pg_search: A tool that can be used to semantic search a query from a database table's content.
tools.desc_selenium_scraping: A tool that can be used to read a specific part of website content. CSS elements are separated by comma, cookies are in format {key1:value1},{key2:value2}
tools.desc_txt_search: A tool that can be used to semantic search a query from a TXT's content.
tools.desc_scrape_element: A tool that can be used to read a specific part of website content. CSS elements are separated by comma, cookies are in format {key1:value1},{key2:value2}
tools.desc_yahoo_finance: A tool that can be used to search Yahoo Finance News.
tools.desc_custom_api: A tool that can be used to make API calls with customizable parameters.
tools.desc_custom_file_write: A tool that can be used to write a file to a specific folder.
tools.desc_duckduckgo_search: A tool to search the web using DuckDuckGo engine.
tools.desc_code_interpreter: This tool is used to give the Agent the ability to run code (Python3) from the code generated by the Agent itself. The code is executed in a sandboxed environment, so it is safe to run any code. Docker required.
tools.desc_custom_code_interpreter: This tool is used to give the Agent the ability to run code (Python3) from the code generated by the Agent itself. The code is executed in a sandboxed environment, so it is safe to run any code. Workspace folder is shared. Docker required.
tools.desc_csv_search_enhanced: A tool that can be used to semantic search a query from a CSV's content.
tools.desc_scrape_website_enhanced: An enhanced tool that can be used to read website content.
tools.desc_scrapfly_scrape: A tool that uses Scrapfly API to scrape websites with advanced features like headless browser support, proxies, and anti-bot bypass.

knowledge.title: Knowledge
knowledge.instruction:
Knowledge sources are used to provide external information to agents.
You can create different types of knowledge sources and assign them to agents or crews.
knowledge.clear_stores_help: This will clear all knowledge stores in CrewAI, removing cached embeddings
knowledge.no_stores_found: No knowledge stores found to clear.
knowledge.name: Name
knowledge.source_path_help: Enter file path relative to the 'knowledge' directory or a URL for docling
knowledge.warning_no_path: Knowledge source {name} has no source path

kickoff.title: Kickoff!
kickoff.no_result: No result yet. Run a crew to see the output.
kickoff.crew_not_valid: Selected crew is not valid. Please fix the issues.

import_export.title: Import/export
import_export.import_success_full: Full database JSON file imported successfully!
import_export.import_error_invalid: Invalid JSON format. Please upload a valid crew or full database export file.

messages.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this {item}?
messages.invalid_input: Invalid input. Please check your data.
